column4: ive seen external laptop sized hd's that have weird 2 headed usb conectors. guess they need power from 2 usb ports.
yes, most laptop drives are around 700-800mA, USB1-2 is only 500mA ... there is low-power laptop drives that will run off one usb port, but most don't
i noticed this laptop has an 'always powered on' usb port also. wonder how many mA it gives.. :)
probably still just the 500mA, it was part of the USB specification
